i1.name: Sunlight
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Leona's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] against enemies apply a mark that lasts 1.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits.

Allied {{tip|champions|champions'}} damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal {{as|{{pp|25 to 144}}|magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Leona's champion ability against enemies apply a mark that lasts 1.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits.

Allied champions' damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal 25 âˆ’ 144 (based on level) bonus magic damage.
i1.notes:
* ''Sunlight's'' mark damage is credited to the allied champion and not to '''Leona'''.
** The damage will benefit from allies' {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic penetration}}}} and will apply any [[Ability effects|spell effects]] and {{stil|spell vamp}} they have.
** {{Pending for test}}: [[Omnivamp]]
* {{ci|Zyra}} has a hidden passive that grants her 10% increased size for {{tt|33 seconds|Estimated}} after having ''Sunlight'' applied to her.

q1.name: Shield_of_Daybreak
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' illuminates her shield, causing her next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds to have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time, gain {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|stun}} the target for 1 second.
''Shield of Daybreak'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Leona's''' basic attack timer.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona illuminates her shield, causing her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain 50 bonus range, deal bonus magic damage and stun the target for 1 second.
Shield of Daybreak resets Leona's basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Shield of Daybreak's'' bonus damage.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Shield of Daybreak's'' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.
* ''Shield of Daybreak's'' attack does not put '''Leona's''' basic attack on cooldown.{{bug|2}}
** This effectively performs a second {{tip|basic attack reset|attack reset}}.
** This is unlike other empowered attacks (including those which, similar to ''Shield of Daybreak'', use a more unconventional spell cast rather than an attack override).
** '''Leona''' will wait out ''Shield of Daybreak's'' wind-down before automatically attacking, anyway. The player must issue the next attack themselves to gain the full benefit of the second reset.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, {{tip|death|dies}}, or is too far away during the empowered attack's cast time, it is cancelled but not consumed.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[buildings]].

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

w1.name: Eclipse
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' raises her ''guard'' for 3 seconds, gaining flat {{tip|Damage reduction|damage reduction}} of up to 50% of the damage instance and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.
Her shield detonates after the duration, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies. If this hits an enemy, '''Leona's''' ''guard'' is extended for an additional 3 seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona raises her guard for 3 seconds, gaining flat damage reduction of up to 50% of the damage instance and bonus armor and bonus magic resistance.
Her shield detonates after the duration, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. If this hits an enemy, Leona's guard is extended for an additional 3 seconds.
w1.notes:
* Neither the cast nor detonation of ''Eclipse'' interrupts any of '''Leona's''' previous orders or ongoing attack windups.
* The resistance scaling will factor from all other sources, excluding ''Eclipse's'' flat bonus. This will recalculate over the duration.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but ''Eclipse's'' extended duration will not be prevented.

effects.str:
• Flat Damage Reduction:
  • Bonus Armor: (+ 20% bonus armor)
  • Bonus Magic Resistance: (+ 20% bonus magic resistance)

e1.name: Zenith_Blade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' projects her sword in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
If she hits at least one enemy {{tip|champion}}, she will {{tip|dash}} 225 units behind the last one struck within 3000 range and {{tip|root}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''''Leona''' is {{tip|lockout|unable}} to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona projects her sword in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
If she hits at least one enemy champion, she will dash 225 units behind the last one struck within 3000 range and root them for 0.5 seconds.
Leona is unable to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight.
e1.notes:
* '''Leona''' will be ordered to basic attack the target.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block ''Zenith Blade's'' effects as well as preventing '''Leona''' from dashing as the last target hit.
<!--
* '''Leona''' will fail to {{tip|root}} or {{tip|dash}} to the target if it becomes {{tip|untargetable}} after being struck or is not within 3000 range.-->
{{Effect at cast time end}}

r1.name: Solar_Flare
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' calls down a solar flare that strikes upon the target location after {{fd|0.625}} seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area before impact and for another 3 seconds afterwards. Enemies hit are dealt {{as|magic damage}}.
Enemies hit are also {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 80% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, or {{tip|stun|stunned}} for the same duration if they are hit by the epicenter.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona calls down a solar flare that strikes upon the target location after 0.625 seconds, granting sight of the area before impact and for another 3 seconds afterwards. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage.
Enemies hit are also slowed by 80% for 1.5 seconds, or stunned for the same duration if they are hit by the epicenter.
r1.notes:
* ''Solar Flare's'' visual effects are only visible to enemies if they have {{tip|sight}} of the area it was cast upon.
* The cast indicator shows 300 radius for the [[area of effect]] and 120 radius for the epicenter, however the actual hitbox radii are larger than those values.
* The revealed radius is not obstructed by [[terrain]] or {{tip|brush}}.
